articles.title: Kim Jong Il Replies to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Replies to Palestinian President

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on August 30 sent a message to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, in reply to his congratulations and best wishes sent to the former on the 66th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					The reply message said:
					
					I express deep thanks to you for sending me congratulations and best wishes on the 66th anniversary of the national liberation of our people.
					
					I, availing myself of this opportunity, sincerely wish you and the Palestinian people successes in their struggle to build an independent state with Kuds as its capital.

articles.title: Congratulations to Singaporean President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Singaporean President

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a congratulatory message to Tony Tan Keng Yam upon his election as president of Singapore.
					
					The message sincerely wished the Singaporean president success in his work, expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations existing between the DPRK and Singapore would grow stronger in various fields in the future.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Trinidad and Tobago
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Trinidad and Tobago

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to George Maxwell Richard, president of Trinidad and Tobago, on Wednesday on the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					
					Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger as desired by the two peoples, Kim in the message wished Trinidad and Tobago development and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Kyrgyzstan

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Roza Otunbayeva, president of Kyrgyzstan, on its national day.
					
					Kim in the message wished the president success in the work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Kyrgyzstan

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Ruslan Kazakbayev, foreign minister of Kyrgyzstan, on its national day.
					
					The message wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Russia-DPRK Joint Energy Program
articles.content:
Russia-DPRK Joint Energy Program

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Some countries are seeking to diversify transport of energy resources to suit the worldwide trend of energy use and development. 
					
					The DPRK and Russia are now discussing a gas pipe project.
					
					At the talks in Ulan-Ude, Russia, on August 24, the top leaders of the DPRK and Russia agreed to form working groups for the development of economic cooperation in various fields, including gas and other energy sector, and railroad connection.
					
					After the talks, Russian President Dmitri Medvedev said, "I ordered our organs to form a special committee. The committee will confirm detailed issues of bilateral cooperation concerning the program of gas transport through the DPRK." 
					
					In early August Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov announced that officials of the two countries held talks and discussed the prospect of the program.  
					
					If gas experts reached the identity of views on the issue, the Russian government will support it in a political aspect, he said.
					
					Russia is one of the world's biggest nations in natural gas deposit and production and crude oil production. 
					
					Russia, situated favorably for gas supply to Europe and other regions, is now interested in expanding its supply capacity.
					
					When the Sakhalin-Khabarovsk-Vladivostok natural gas pipe project with the annual capacity of 30 billion cubic meters, which was launched in 2009, is completed, Russia will be able to not only meet its domestic demand but have the capacity of supplying gas to Asia-Pacific nations.
					
					Russia plans to expand the energy supply to this region so that in 2020 crude oil and gas can take 30 percent from 3 percent, and 25 percent from 5 percent respectively in the country's total export.
					
					The gas pipe linking Russia with the DPRK is important in the effort for fulfilling the plan.
					
					Speaking to reporters on August 25, Russian Vice-Minister of Industry and Energy Anatoli Yanovsky said the gas pipe project has been under deliberation for years and various proposals have been examined for the project, but it has been confirmed that the project will cost most reasonably in case the pipe is laid across the DPRK.
					
					Analysts also pay attention to the political significance of the project.
					
					Dr. Leonid Petrov at National University of Australia said the project will be profitable to all parties concerned.
					
					The joint energy program Russia and the DPRK are discussing at a time when many countries are trying to make an effective use of energy draws interest of the international community.

articles.title: Anniversary of NAM Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of NAM Marked in DPRK

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM).
					
					Present there on invitation were representatives of NAM member nations and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations participating in the NAM as observers and guests.
					
					Officials of the DPRK Foreign Ministry including Minister Pak Ui Chun were present there.
					
					Pak Ui Chun said in his speech at the reception that the NAM has greatly contributed to protecting the global peace and security and helping NAM member nations ensure collective rights and meet their interests since its foundation, adding that the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by making an immortal contribution to strengthening and developing the NAM and realizing the human cause of independence are now being further glorified by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					He noted that the DPRK government would remain true to the idea and principle of the NAM in the future, too and boost the friendly and cooperative relations with all other countries of the world and international organizations that respect their sovereignty.
					
					Amr Abdelwahab Mohieeldin Abuahmed, Egyptian charge d'affaires ad interim, read out a letter sent by the foreign minister of Egypt, the chair country of the NAM.
					
					The letter said:
					
					The NAM countries should strictly adhere to the principles of sovereignty, territorial integrity and non-interference in other's internal affairs and the right to self-determination, prevent the impact of climate change and worldwide financial, food and energy crises and put the South-South Cooperation into practice.
					
					All the member nations of the NAM are required to make a positive contribution to developing the NAM, concluded the letter.

articles.title: Nationwide On-line System of Koryo Medical Service Established
articles.content:
Nationwide On-line System of Koryo Medical Service Established

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A nationwide on-line system of Koryo medical service was established in the DPRK.
					
					Scientists of the Academy of Koryo Medical Science and the Korean Computer Center established relevant database by analyzing and assorting a huge volume of information in an orderly way. They developed comprehensive program "Koryo Medicine" for diagnosis, prescription and consultation and opened up homepage "Koryo Medicine."
					
					The homepage has special medical service assistance system for displaying the diagnosis of hundreds of diseases, their treatment and prescription, service system for the promotion of health of people, system for access to Koryo medical vocabulary and medicines and on-line consultation system.
					
					The server works 24 hours a day, ensuring prompt and convenient provision of information to subscribers.
					
					A computer room equipped with technical means recently started its service at the hospital of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University. Koryo hospitals in provinces and many other treatment and prevention institutions are following the suit.

articles.title: April 18 Best Player Prize Awarded in DPRK
articles.content:
April 18 Best Player Prize Awarded in DPRK

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The April 18 best player prize was awarded to school youth and children who set an example in sports activities with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					
					The prize instituted in Juche 95 (2006) is awarded to players who proved successful at the annual National School Youth and Children's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize.
					
					School youth and children's sports schools, school children's palaces, houses and secondary and primary schools across the country have operated sports groups to bring up many future players who would contribute to the development of sports of the country. 
					
					Excellent 40 players were selected as the best players. They proved successful in contests including basketball, volleyball, table tennis and Taekwon-Do at the 37th National School Youth and Children's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize this year.

articles.title: World Cup Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
World Cup Postage Stamps Issued

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- New stamps about the 21st World Cup were released in the DPRK recently. 
					
					They include a sheetlet and seven individual stamps. 
					
					Seen in the upper part of the sheetlet are the Korean, Russian and English letters "FIFA World Cup, Russia, 2018" and a picture of the world cup. 
					
					The sheetlet and individual stamps contain pictures of footballers performing special techniques and football stadiums built in Russia.

articles.title: Great Kanto Quake Brings Calamity to Koreans
articles.content:
Great Kanto Quake Brings Calamity to Koreans

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A 7.9-magnitude quake hit Kanto area, Japan on the morning of September 1, 1923.
					
					The devastating quake set afire cities and villages of Kanto area, leaving a number of residents dead or homeless.
					
					But, the quake did not only bring a natural disaster.
					
					At that time, the afflicted people lodged protest with the government for failing to take relief measures in time.
					
					Upset by the protest, the Japanese government architected a massive killing of Japan-resident Koreans, in a bid to divert elsewhere public sentiments against the government and tide over the serious socio-political crises caused by the quake.
					
					At an extraordinary Cabinet meeting held in the prime minister's residence, the Intelligence Agency was ordered to quell the public sentiments. In line with the order, the agency spread such false rumors as "Koreans set fire" and "Koreans put poison in wells".
					
					On September 2, royal edict No. 401 was issued to all local governors to spread a rumor about Koreans' riot and, under this pretext, massacre Koreans in Japan.
					
					At an emergency Cabinet meeting, the government organized the Kanto Martial Law Command involving vicious officers. Rogues joined the army and police in the massacre.
					
					They set up checkpoints in every corner and stopped passers-by to make them pronounce "go-yen-go-ju-go-sen" (5 yen and 55 sen) difficult for Koreans to properly pronounce. If they found anyone who was not good at that pronunciation, they killed him or her on the spot.
					
					The killers used a variety of tools, such as rifle, Nippon sword, dagger, bamboo spear and iron hook, to gouge out Koreans' eyeballs, cut off noses and even disembowel pregnant women.
					
					The number of the massacred Koreans reached nearly 23 000 at that time.
					
					In actuality, the calamity was a tragedy brought by the Japanese government.
					
					Japan can neither deny nor cover up the massacre.

articles.title: General Strike of Media Trade Unions Supported in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strike of Media Trade Unions Supported in S. Korea

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A solidarity council for supporting the general strike of the media trade unions of south Korea held a press conference in Youido of Seoul on August 28.
					
					The organization said that civic and public organizations supported the general strike of the media trade unions against the authorities' moves to control media.
					
					Any step to be taken by the authorities to offer preference to the conservative media including Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo would represent the interests of the privileged circles and conservative forces.
					
					It noted that just is the demand of the media trade unions in the general strike.
					
					The organization disclosed the crimes committed by the conservative media.

articles.title: Withdrawal of NSL and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of NSL and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Meeting Prisoners of Conscience made up of members of at least 50 labor, human rights and public organizations in south Korea have been going around all parts of south Korea from August 29 as part of their struggle for the release of the prisoners of conscience.
					
					The organization disclosed that at present there are over 900 prisoners of conscience including pro-democracy and pro-reunification figures who were thrown behind bars on the strength of the "National Security Law" (NSL).
					
					Referring to the daily worsening human rights abuses in prisons, the organization firmly demanded the authorities withdraw the fascist law, stop suppression under the pretext of public security and set free prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Struggle for Solving Registration Fee Issue Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Solving Registration Fee Issue Declared in S. Korea

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- More than 700 organizations of students, their parents and civic and public figures including the University Students in the 21st Century and the Registration Fee Network of south Korea formed the people's headquarters for getting the registration fee halved on August 29.
					
					At an inaugural ceremony, they accused the authorities of not honoring their commitment to halving the registration fee.
					
					Many students are not going to universities as they are unable to afford huge registration fee. This issue requires an urgent solution, it held.
					
					Vowing to wage various struggles to this end, they said they would expand the candlelight rallies to all other parts of south Korea and launch an action and demonstration to delay the payment of registration fee.
					
					They also said they would open the all-people meeting and the general meeting of students in different parts of south Korea on September 29.
					
					If the "Grand National Party" does not respond to the demand of the people, it will be forced to pay a high price, it warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Wholesale Crackdown upon Protesters under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Wholesale Crackdown upon Protesters under Fire

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Measure Council for Checking the Construction of Jeju Naval Base released a statement titled "We denounce the military, prosecution, police and conservative press for defying public calling for dialogue and creating a terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of security" on August 27.
					
					The statement accused the prosecution authorities of applying on August 24 for warrants of arrest for the participants in the action against the naval base construction including the chief of the Kangjong Village, Jeju Island for putting them in custody.
					
					It recalled that when Jeju islanders lodged a strong protest against the project, the police walked them off as if they had been waiting for their action and the prosecution clarified its stand to strongly react against the protest while conservative media are busy branding those forces opposed to the construction project as "pro-north forces".
					
					This indicates that the authorities are set to stem the trend of people's protest only by using government power, it said.
					
					The statement demanded the "government" release all the arrested people, stop the project and make an apology for the recent incident.
					
					Representatives of opposition parties on Jeju Island held a press conference at the village on August 29 at which they chided the authorities' suppression.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised by Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised by Foreign Countries

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from August 23 to 25 on the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. Seminars, meetings, film shows and photo exhibitions were held in Guinea, Cambodia, Poland, Pakistan, Ethiopia and India.
					
					Displayed at the venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their undying Songun revolutionary feats and books and photos of the vitality of the Songun politics.
					
					Films shown included "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said the full-fledged look of the DPRK reacting to the U.S. hard line with the toughest stand under the uplifted banner of Songun helped the world progressives keenly realize the invincible might of the Songun idea. The human cause of independence will win a brilliant victory under the banner of the Songun idea, he added.
					
					The chairman of the Poland-DPRK Association noted the national defence capability of the DPRK will grow stronger and socialist construction has a bright prospect as long as there are the army and people who regard the great Juche idea and the Songun idea as the guidelines of their activities. 
					
					For its original Songun politics the DPRK has been known to the world as a powerful socialist state the imperialists dare not provoke and is praised by the world people, said the secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan.
					
					The chairperson of the Indian Working Women Society for Study of the Juche Philosophy stressed that the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il has put the political and ideological might of the Korean People's Army on a high level matchless with any other army of the world.
					
					Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted in the event in Poland and the seminar in India.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, made public a statement on Aug. 23 on the 63rd anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					He, in the statement, praised President Kim Il Sung for founding the DPRK, the first people's country in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years. He also praised more than 60 years of victory and glory covered by the DPRK.
					
					The statement noted that leader Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK to be the Juche-oriented socialist state with the invincible might, adding that building a great prosperous and powerful nation is his far-reaching plan and firm will.
					
					Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK will prosper amid absolute support and trust of the popular masses, the statement stressed.
					
					The immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the building of the people's country and those of Kim Jong Il who has glorified the cause of the President will shine forever, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Peruvian Organizations: Powerful Defence Capacity Guarantees Peace
articles.content:
Peruvian Organizations: Powerful Defence Capacity Guarantees Peace

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Peruvian organizations made public a joint statement on Aug. 25 in denunciation of the war exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities. They included the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the "Kim Jong Suk Library" of Peru, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Pyongyang Cultural Center in Peru.
					
					Expressing concerns over the tense situation on the Korean Peninsula, the statement denounced the provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet trigger-happy forces.
					
					Thanks to the Songun politics the Korean People's Army developed to be a powerful army which can repel any aggressors at a single blow, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					Songun proved in practice that only powerful defence capacity can guarantee peace.
					
					We strongly demand the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop their joint military exercises.
					
					We also hope that all the international and domestic organizations would extend solidarity to our demand.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked by Peruvian Institution
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked by Peruvian Institution

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru issued a bulletin on August 23 on the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					The bulletin edited an article with his photo. The article said:
					
					Kim Jong Il is increasing the defence capability with his Songun politics to firmly defend socialism of Juche.
					
					He formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism toward the end of the last century. The Songun politics helps settle all the issues of the revolution and construction with the army as the main force.
					
					He has paid primary attention and big efforts to training the army into the main force and hard core of the revolution true to the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Socialism has been firmly defended and a new era of building a thriving nation opened in the DPRK under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in State Building Will Shine Long with Socialist Korea: Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in State Building Will Shine Long with Socialist Korea: Bangladeshi Paper

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi paper Blits on August 24 carried special articles headlined "People's Country", "21st Century and Juche Idea and "Appearance of DPRK" with a portrait of President Kim Il Sung on the 63rd anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					In an article titled "President Kim Il Sung's Feats in State Building" the paper said the DPRK is looking up to him as its eternal President because his feats in state building are great and immortal.
					
					The President put forward the original idea and theory of state building and provided the steadfast guidelines for it, it noted.
					
					He built the new type workers' power, the people's power, strengthened it into a powerful weapon for accomplishing the socialist cause and turned the DPRK into the invincible socialist power based on the firm political, military and economic foundation, it stressed.
					
					His feats in state building are being successfully inherited by Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, it said, adding his feats in state building will shine long with the eternal prosperity of socialist Korea.
					
					In another article titled "For the Strengthening of Non-Aligned Movement" it noted the half a century-long history of the NAM is associated with the precious feats the President performed in strengthening it.
					
					The feats the President performed in developing the NAM and accomplishing global independence are shining thanks to leader Kim Jong Il, the paper noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ethiopia

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Ethiopia on August 25.
					
					The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in defending and glorifying the Juche-based idea of President Kim Il Sung and his feats in state building.

articles.title: China Plans to Prevent Flood Damage
articles.content:
China Plans to Prevent Flood Damage

					Beijing, August 30 (KCNA) -- Henan Province, China, is speeding up the project to prevent flood damage as part of the plan to improve river till 2015 and build reservoirs in dangerous spots.
					
					The province will reportedly repair 254 reservoirs before the rainy season in 2012.

articles.title: Nicaragua's President Calls for Latin America Union Unity
articles.content:
Nicaragua's President Calls for Latin America Union Unity

					PPyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Nicaragua's President Daniel Ortega Saavedra has called on the Latin American trade unions to unite, so that the labor movement can also push forward the political and social changes the region is experiencing for their peoples. He said this at the 4th Lain America Trade Union Meeting in Managua on August 27.
					
					The meeting marked an important occasion in ensuring the unity of action of trade union organizations in the struggle against imperialism and neoliberalism, he stressed.

articles.title: Demonstrations in Spain
articles.content:
Demonstrations in Spain

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Several protests have taken place in major cities of Spain Sunday against the authorities' wrong decision.
					
					Many citizens were present there. They protested against the authorities' decision to introduce in the Constitution a cap on deficit limit. 
					
					They strongly called for an immediate cancellation of the decision.

articles.title: Mozambique Combats Drug Trafficking
articles.content:
Mozambique Combats Drug Trafficking

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The authorities in the northern Mozambican province of Nampula arrested six people in connection with drug trafficking on August 26. More than a dozen kilo of the drug Hashish was seized.

articles.title: Iranian Women, Role Model for Other Women Worldwide
articles.content:
Iranian Women, Role Model for Other Women Worldwide

					Tehran, August 30 (KCNA) -- President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said on Saturday that Iranian women can be regarded as a role model for their gender throughout the world.
					
					Women can play a very prominent role in the society, said the Iranian president in a meeting with a group of women activists and managers at the Presidential Office on Saturday. 
					
					Iranian women with reliance on their capabilities are now playing an active role in industries, management, education, arts and politics fields as well as in families and they are able to carry out such significant responsibilities towards other women in the world. 
					
					One of the greatest responsibilities of women is to bring up pious and capable children, he said. 
					
					Suppression of women in societies means suppression of humanity, said the Iranian president who called for respecting all women.

articles.title: Iran Manufactures Maritime Patrol Aircraft
articles.content:
Iran Manufactures Maritime Patrol Aircraft

					Tehran, August 30 (KCNA) -- Iran's Defense Minister Brigadier General Ahmad Vahidi said Saturday that the Islamic Republic is manufacturing maritime patrol aircraft, the local satellite Press TV reported.
					
					The aircraft is equipped with optical and radar subsystems and is capable of operating for long durations, the defense minister said.
					
					"This product which is currently being produced by the defense industry can be widely used in the military sector and maritime patrol and we hope we can introduce it to the armed forces in the near future," Vahidi was quoted as saying.

articles.title: New Factory Begins Operation in Iran
articles.content:
New Factory Begins Operation in Iran

					Tehran, August 30 (KCNA) -- A carbon fabric factory was put into operation in Iran on August 27.
					
					The factory was built with indigenous technology and by its own efforts. The carbon fabric being produced in the factory is said to be widely used in various economic fields including not only national defense industry but automatic energy industry.
					
					The Minister of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics addressing the opening ceremony said that Iran continues to make great success in the field of defense up-building, while standing against the sanctions by the U.S. and the West.

articles.title: Honduras Recognizes Palestine as Independent State
articles.content:
Honduras Recognizes Palestine as Independent State

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Honduras on Friday recognized Palestine as an independent state amid a drive by the Arab League to upgrade it to full membership status in the United Nations.

articles.title: Nigerian President Vows to Jointly Fight Terrorism
articles.content:
Nigerian President Vows to Jointly Fight Terrorism

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan has said the country would work with the United Nations and world leaders to ensure terrorism is brought under control globally. 
					
					The Nigerian leader said this on Saturday after inspecting the site of the bomb explosions at the UN House in Abuja.
					
					The bombing on Friday morning claimed many lives and left others injured. The president said Nigeria is not in isolation on the issue of terrorist attacks and that the country is willing to cooperate with the international community to tackle the problem.

articles.title: Sudanese President Calls for Enhancing Role of Media
articles.content:
Sudanese President Calls for Enhancing Role of Media

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Sudanese President Omar al-Bashir on Saturday further reiterated his government's support for the Sudanese press so that it would play positive roles in serving Sudan's interests, praising the press and its responsibility in progress of the country.

articles.title: Muslim Countries Parliaments Play Crucial Role in Issue of Palestine
articles.content:
Muslim Countries Parliaments Play Crucial Role in Issue of Palestine

					Tehran, August 30 (KCNA) -- Majlis Speaker Ali Larijani in a telephone call said that parliaments of Muslim countries play a very significant role in the issue of Palestine. 
					
					Referring to the current regional developments, he underlined the significance of consultations and said that parliaments of Muslim countries should mobilize their capacities to help restore Palestinians' rights to themselves.

articles.title: Tunisia Condemns Israeli Military Aggression against Gaza
articles.content:
Tunisia Condemns Israeli Military Aggression against Gaza

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Tunisia has firmly condemned the Israeli military operation against Gaza, the state-run press agency TAP reported on Friday, quoting a communique released by the foreign affairs ministry.
					
					The communique stated that at the time when the region is witnessing major changes, Israel is engaging in an "odious military aggression that has caused the death of many innocent victims."
					
					Tunisia also expressed its preoccupation at the "silence of the international community before this grave violation of the international humanitarian law."
					
					It called on acting parties in the international community and the Mideast Quartet to put an end to Israel's military aggression, protect the Palestinian people and lift the embargo imposed on the Gaza strip.

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Different Countries
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Different Countries

					Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A slow-moving typhoon triggered a landslide that killed two children Saturday as the storm made landfall and drenched most of the northern Philippines, officials said.
					
					The predawn landslide triggered by Typhoon Nanmadol buried a hillside house, killing a 6-year-old girl and her 5-year-old brother in Pangasinan province's San Fabian township, civil defense officials said.
					
					Typhoon hit Pangasinan and Catanduanes provinces and Baguio City, leaving six dead and two others wounded and paralyzing traffic as of August 27.
					
					A 5.7-magnitude earthquake hit Mongolia's southern Gobi Province that day, destroying houses and causing other damage.
					
					Heavy rains hit Oyo State, Nigeria on August 26 and 27, leaving 12 people and 5 others missing destroying bridges.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon

					Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio con el entranable pueblo dirigiendo en el terreno la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon al regreso de su visita al extranjero.
					
					Cuando el llego al dique de Ryongrim de la planta 1 de Huichon por via de la carretera Jonchon-dique de Ryongrim construida nuevamente, los constructores militares le dieron calurosa bienvenida en representacion de todos los militares y civiles del pais.
					
					El Dirigente respondio a la aclamacion entusiasta de ellos.
					
					Luego de escuchar en el dique las explicaciones del estado de construccion de la central y la carretera mencionada, recorrio varios lugares del campo de construccion.
					
					Al mirar el dique de Ryongrim y gran lago artificial formado ahi, dijo que son muy espectaculares y se mostro muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares hayan hecho magnificamente esa creacion monumental a registrarse en la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Es un gran exito que ellos hayan construido en solo dos meses la carretera Jonchon-dique de Ryongrim de decenas de kilometros de largo, evaluo y prosiguio que es un gran honor y orgullo para el PTC tener al ejercito popular que materializa hasta el final las indicaciones del partido.
					
					Dio agradecimiento especial del Comandante Supremo del EPC a todos los constructores militares y les dispenso grandes benevolencias.
					
					Senalo que los constructores de la central de Huichon son los combatientes del frente, que defienden al Comite Central del PTC no con palabras sino exponiendose a los riesgos, y primeros vanguardias de la epoca de gran auge que adelantan el dia de victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Las brillantes proezas logradas en la construccion de la central son una muestra contundente de la inagotable fuerza espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y de la gran potencialidad de la economia nacional autarquica, enfatizo.
					
					Ademas, deviene otra orgullosa victoria de ellos en la lucha por defender y glorificar el socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares frustrando con valentia las brutales maniobras de los imperialistas y reaccionarios orientadas a aislar y atropellar a la RPDC, apunto.
					
					Nuestro partido decidio terminar durante 3 anos esta colosal obra de transformacion de la naturaleza que no puede imaginar nadie, porque confio en la indoblegable fuerza espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo, senalo y subrayo en tono orgulloso que a traves de la construccion de la central, se ha probado otra vez que el socialismo al estilo coreano es el mas ventajoso del mundo y no hay nada imposible si se movilizan las inagotables fuerzas del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Al ver la palabra "De un tiron" esculpida en una pieza de granito, dijo que las generaciones venideras podran conocer bien los rasgos ideo-espirituales y el modo de lucha de los militares del EPC, quienes cumplieron a ultranza las ordenes del partido, leyendo esa consigna. 
					
					Las unidades del EPC cumplen magnificamente el papel de vanguardia tambien en el frente de Huichon, dijo y enfatizo que los orgullosos meritos de los militares, que dedicaron todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras, seran eternos junto con la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Luego de recorrer el campo de construccion,    Kim Jong Il presento las tareas importantes que se presentan para resolver satisfactoriamente el problema de electricidad, incluyendo la construccion de la central.
					
					La construccion de la central hidroelectrica es una labor importante para materializar el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la solucion del problema de electricidad es la tarea mas primordial para la construccion de un Estado prospero, senalo.
					
					Indico que construir en gran escala las centrales hidroelectricas de tamanos grandes, medianos y pequenos es la invariable politica del PTC e instruyo seguir prestando profunda atencion a esta labor.
					
					Nos queda poco tiempo hasta 2012 en que se celebrara el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, senalo y llamo a registrar grandes innovaciones y saltos en todos los sectores claves de la construccion del socialismo para demostrar al mundo cuan grande sera el milagro que van a crear el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que avanzan a galopes hacia a la invencible potencia.
					
					Al final, se fotografio junto con los constructores militares.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Ri Myong Su, ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Kim Won Hong y Hyon Chol Hae, generales de ejercito del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el distrito de Ryongrim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el distrito de Ryongrim

					Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el distrito de Ryongrim, situado en el curso superior del rio Jangja en la parte oriental de la provincia de Jagang. 
					
					Por los esfuerzos abnegados de los constructores militares y los habitantes locales, fueron  construidos la Casa de Cultura del Distrito, el combinado de servicios, la piscina y otros modernos establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico, con lo cual se cambio por completo la  fisonomia del distrito. 
					
					Ante todo, el Dirigente recorrio la piscina recien construida, donde dijo que la piscina reviste suma importancia para formar a los jovenes y ninos escolares como fidedignos trabajadores del pais dispuestos de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud y asegurar una vida feliz a los habitantes distritales y se refirio a la necesidad de ponerla en racional funcionamiento. 
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en la Casa de Cultura del distrito recien construida conforme al gusto estetico moderno. 
					
					Al recorrer el interior y el exterior de la Casa de Cultura, hizo conocimiento detallado de la construccion y de la gestion. 
					
					Puesto que se ha construido magnificamente la Casa de Cultura, deben organizar con escrupulosidad las actividades de distintos tipos para asegurar a los trabajadores una suficiente vida cultural, dijo y agrego que deben cubrir las necesidades culturales de los habitantes mediante la normalizacion de la gestion de tal establecimiento cultural. 
					
					En la piscina, la Casa de Cultura y otros establecimientos de servicio publico, construidos nuevamente en el distrito de Ryongrim, estan impregnados los esfuerzos esmerados de los militares por el pueblo, ratifico y evaluo reiteradamente los esfuerzos de los constructores militares que pusieron de pleno manifiesto el ambiente de ayuda al pueblo y les dio agradecimiento.  
					
					Luego de recorrer varios lugares del distrito, el Dirigente presento las tareas para acondicionarlo mas comodamente de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo. 
					
					Para este fin, es preciso tener el diseno con vistas al futuro y construir todos los edificios conforme a las peculiaridades topograficas del distrito montanoso y en el principio de proteger y aumentar el hermoso paisaje natural. 
					
					Apunto la necesidad de prestar profunda atencion a la gestion de los edificios ya construidos y los establecimientos de servicio publico y de organizar bien las actividades de servicio y de administracion para que el pueblo pudiera beneficiarse de ello. 
					
					El Dirigente expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores del distrito de Ryongrim realizaran orgullosos meritos laborales en la conversion del distrito en un paraiso socialista, aprendiendo el espiritu revolucionario de los militares que se manifiesta en los campos de construccion socialista. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los cuadros directivos del partido y el ejercito: Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a su homologo de Trinidad y Tobago
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a su homologo de Trinidad y Tobago

					Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Trinidad y Tobago, George Maxwell Richard, en ocasion del 49o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					
					En su misiva el remitente expreso su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se intensificaran y se desarrollaran mas conforme al anhelo de los pueblos de ambos paises e hizo votos por el desarrollo y prosperidad de Trinidad y Tobago.

articles.title: Genocidio de coreanos durante gran terremoto de Kanto
articles.content:
Genocidio de coreanos durante gran terremoto de Kanto

					Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- Por la manana del primero de septiembre de 1923, un terremoto de 7.9 grados en la escala abierta de Richter hizo temblar la region de Kanto de Japon.
					
					El subsiguiente incendio envolvio en llamas varias ciudades y aldeas de la zona dejando incontables muertos y desamparados.
					
					El devastador terremoto de Kanto registrado en la historia no fue un simple desastre natural porque termino en la caza de coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					En aquel entonces, los habitantes damnificados  endurecian las protestas al gobierno por no tomar medidas urgentes de socorro.
					
					Por eso, las autoridades japonesas se vieron en la necesidad de calmar el sentimiento antigubernamental del pueblo para salir de la seria crisis sociopolitica en que cayeron por el terremoto.
					
					En la reunion provisional de los ministros efectuada en la oficina del premier japones, se dio a la agencia de inteligencia la orden de usar todos los medios y metodos para tranquilizar la opinion publica.
					
					Segun la orden, la agencia de inteligencia invento unos rumores para distraer la mirada critica del pueblo y enfocarla en la inocente comunidad coreana, tales como "los que provocan incendios y envenenan los pozos de agua potable son coreanos".
					
					Por la tarde del 2 de septiembre, se impartio a los gobernadores regionales la orden de reprimir a los coreanos.
					
					Seguidamente, se falsifico el "rumor de la insurreccion de coreanos" para convencer a los japoneses de que es "necesaria" y "legitima" la masacre de coreanos y se proclamo el decreto del rey japones no.401 para ese fin.
					
					El gobierno reaccionario de Japon convoco la reunion extraordinaria del gabinete y organizo el cuartel general de la ley marcial de Kanto con los oficiales mas infames.
					
					Hasta los pandilleros se sumaron a los militares y policias movilizados en la caza de coreanos.
					
					Los asesinos japoneses instalaron por doquier los puestos de control y exigian a los que pasaban decir una palabra japonesa dificil de pronunciar por los coreanos.
					
					A los que no la pronunciaron bien, los daban por coreanos y los mataban degollandolos o a modo de haraquiri.
					
					Usando las armas mortiferas de todo tipo como rifles, espadas japonesas, punales, lanzas de bambu y ganchos de hierro, sacaron los ojos y cortaron las narices de los coreanos, para colmo, mataron hasta a las embarazadas desentranandoles el feto.
					
					El numero de los coreanos asesinados salvajemente entonces sobrepasa 23 mil.
					
					Japon no podra tergiversar ni ocultar jamas su historia de matanzas del pasado.
